plot outline: Ragini MMS is a sensuous paranormal film, shot as if in real time! The quintessential couple, Ragini and Uday, set out to have a dirty weekend at a friend's farmhouse on the outskirts of Mumbai. The weekend getaway quickly changes gears as they find themselves in a house that has been rigged with cameras in Bigg Boss style. The cameras that were meant to capture love-making are witness to something that is beyond the realm of human understanding...something metaphysical.... Within the confines of this house, Ragini and Uday are now at the mercy of an unexplainable paranormal force. With sundown approaching, what will the new entrants of the house do? Positively, among the most keenly awaited films of the season, Ragini MMS, a hybrid of fact and fiction, is thrilling voyeurism from the producers of Love Sex Aur Dhokha. The scariest date movie, buffering in Theatres on Friday the 13th May!
title: Ragini MMS
plot: Out to relax and have fun at a farmhouse, a couple experience horror at the hands of an unknown entity.

_Ragini MMS_ (qv) is a sensuous paranormal film, shot as if in real time! The quintessential couple, Ragini and Uday, set out to have a dirty weekend at a friend's farmhouse on the outskirts of Mumbai. The weekend getaway quickly changes gears as they find themselves in a house that has been rigged with cameras in Bigg Boss style. The cameras that were meant to capture love-making are witness to something that is beyond the realm of human understanding...something metaphysical.... Within the confines of this house, Ragini and Uday are now at the mercy of an unexplainable paranormal force. With sundown approaching, what will the new entrants of the house do? Positively, among the most keenly awaited films of the season, _Ragini MMS_ (qv), a hybrid of fact and fiction, is thrilling voyeurism from the producers of Love Sex Aur Dhokha. The scariest date movie, buffering in Theatres on Friday the 13th May!::Anonymous

Uday and Ragini decide to travel to a friend's farmhouse in the country and spend some time together. Upon arrival, Ragini finds the entire bungalow rigged with cameras, and Uday is recording their movements on his camcorder. They settle down to have some fun but are soon interrupted by two friends, Priya and Vishal, who are en-route to Matheran. The foursome chill together, but Vishal gets upset when he finds that Uday is not pleased by their presence, and they quickly depart. Finally alone, the two try bondage and intimacy but will be interrupted again - this time by a malevolent and vengeful Marathi-speaking entity.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

For pleasure and privacy; a young couple, Ragini and Uday travels to a bungalow located in a forest like region. Their privacy are interrupted when they are joined by another couple, Vishal and Priya where they imbibed. Soon their privacy returned resulting in deep intimacy and bondage until they are made targets by an invincible evil force with no way of escape.::gavin (racktoo@hotmail.com)
